wikipedia_page.main:
Dave Hull (born 3 November 1985) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who has played in the 2000s and 2010s. He has played for Swinton Lions and Rochdale hornets where he won a grand final in 2013 , having previously played for St. Helens in the Super League, as a fullback.
Dave Hull played his junior career alongside James Graham at the Thatto Heath club.
In 2007, Hull was promoted to train with the St. Helens first team squad.
